text: The men's K-1 500 metres competition at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Montemor-o-Velho took place at the Centro de Alto Rendimento de Montemor-o-Velho. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Thursday 23 August 2018 || 10:59 || Heats |- | rowspan=3|Friday 24 August 2018 || 11:02 || Semifinals |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 16:39 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |- | 17:05 || Final B |} All times are Western European Summer Time (UTC+1) ==Results== ===Heats=== The six fastest boats in each heat, plus the three fastest remaining boats advanced to the semifinals.
